Package com.topdesk.cases.toprob

Interface Grid

  • public interface Grid
    The grid on which Rob lives. The grid is rectangular, i.e. all rows have an equal width and all columns have an equal height.

    On the grid there is Rob's room, there is the kitchen, there are one or more holes and there is one bug. The location of all these elements is guaranteed to be different. The bug can for instance never appear in Rob's room or in the kitchen.

    It is also guaranteed that there is a free path from the room to the kitchen.

      • getBug

        Coordinate getBug​(int time)
        The location of the bug at the given time. If Rob is at the same place at the same time as the bug is, Rob will not survive.

        The bug is never at the same location two times in a row. In other words:
        getBug(time) will yield another result than getBug(time + 1)

        Be aware though that the bug might show up again at the same cell sometime later. So:
        getBug(time) and getBug(time + n) for any n>1 might have the same result.

        The bug does not have to move between adjacent cells, but can appear anywhere on the grid.

        Parameters:
        time - the time for which the location is requested
        Returns:
        the location of the bug
